Keglevich G ,

László BB.
A “green” variation of the Hirao reaction: the P-C coupling of diethyl phosphite, alkyl phenyl-H-phosphinates and secondary phosphine oxides with bromoarenes using a P-ligand-free Pd(OAc) 2 catalyst under micro-wave and solvent-free conditions . RSC Adv 2014; 4: 22808– 16.
